name: Powerbase Server
description: The Rails API server of Powerbase.

CLIENT.description: The domain of the powerbase client.

AUTH_TOKEN_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of tokens used for confirming emails and resetting passwords.

JWT_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies used for user sessions.

API_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A secret key for encrypting/decrypting values from the Rails API server (e.g. encrypted database credentials).

ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A secret key for encrypting/decrypting values stored in the database.

HUBSPOT_API_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of tokens for hubspot purposes.

ENABLE_LISTENER.description: Boolean whether to listen for changes in the remote database.

SENTRY_DSN.description: To monitor errors, provide the Sentry DSN (optional).

ENABLE_SENTRY.description: Boolean whether to enable error monitoring or not.

POWERBASE_CLOUD_HOST.description: The host where powerbase will create new databases and roles (e.g. powerbase-test.random-string.us-east-2.rds.amazonaws.com).

POWERBASE_CLOUD_DB_CONNECTION.description: The connection string to connect to the database instance where powerbase can create databases and roles.
